st:Description.name: NCMfgOutput
st:Description.st:role: Lists the settings of the operations used in the Machining applications
st:Description.st:detailedRole: The operation machining settings are useful to manages options on manufacturing operations

st:default.st:role: By default no company preference is done

st:attribute.Name: PPPath
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the path where the Post Processors are located
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the path where the Post Processors are located

st:attribute.Name: StoreContactPoints
st:attribute.st:role: Store contact points in toolpath during its computation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Store contact points in toolpath during its computation

st:attribute.Name: ToolOutputPoint
st:attribute.st:role: Chooses the reference point to compute toolpath with
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Chooses the reference point to compute toolpath with

st:enum.st:role: Tool center for ball end tools

st:default.st:role: By default the tool output point is the tool tip

st:attribute.Name: NCDocDirectory
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the path where the NC documentation files are generated
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the path where the NC documentation files are generated

st:attribute.Name: NCCodeDirectory
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the path for storing the NC code output
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the path to store the NC code output

st:attribute.Name: MOUpdate
st:attribute.st:role: Do not generate NC code when MO is not uptodate
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Do not generate NC code when MO is not uptodate

st:attribute.Name: NCFileExtension
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the extension name of generated NC code files

st:attribute.Name: OriginFixedOnPart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Fixed on the part after table rotation

st:attribute.Name: PackTP
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Choose the location to store Toolpath

st:enum.st:role: Store tool path in the current document
Store tool path in an external file

st:default.st:role: By default the tool path is in the current document

st:attribute.Name: VideoDirectory
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Choose the location to store Video

st:attribute.Name: PackTPDirectory
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Choose the location to store tool path

st:attribute.Name: MinCollisionCheck
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the minimum length for collision detection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the minimum length for collision detection

st:default.st:role: By default, the minimum length collision detection is set to 0.
